title: I Dumped My Prince Charming Once Again - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Psychological   Sci-fi   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Celebrities   Cold Love Interests   Cunning Protagonist   Dancers   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love Rivals   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Showbiz   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 萋萋鹦鹉洲
description:
The playboy Xie Yu who loved handsome boys only failed his mission again!

After numerous failures, Xie Yu finally entered his favorite system!

“… I am not afraid of you at all. As always, I come in and out of others’ world quite easily…”

Before he finished his words, the approaching man held his chin and said,“But that’s not the case with me. Since you have come into my world, you would never get out.”>
